item.title: Is Wall Street losing faith in AI?
item.description: A rough week for tech stocks might signal a loss of investor confidence in artificial intelligence.

item.title: How startups can lure good talent fairly without big tech bank accounts

item.title: Rivian gives RJ Scaringe a new pay package worth up to $5B
item.description: The company canceled a similar-sized award from 2021, when EV optimism was sky-high, due to the "unlikeliness" that the associated goals could be met.
